## SmithyLambdaIntegration.bindToSpecMethod() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Create permissions for API Gateway to invoke the lambda handler. If a credentialsRole is already supplied then no new permissions are created

**Signature:**

```typescript
bindToSpecMethod(method: ISpecMethod): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  method | [ISpecMethod](./smithy-cdk.ispecmethod.md) | REST API path which should invoke this lambda |

**Returns:**

void
